messages.title: Make Maldon Constituency Safer
messages.content: Our police do a great job in keeping us safe locally and crime is still relatively low. However, I know that there are concerns and I very much welcome the 150 extra police officers deployed in Essex last year with another 215 to come. Recently, I went on patrol with the new Maldon Town Centre Team and I am pleased that there is another new Team in South Woodham Ferrers as well as an expanded Rural Engagement Team covering the villages. Boris Johnson has now committed to an additional 20,000 police officers on our streets nationally and I am pressing to ensure we get our fair share.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Delivering on the result of the EU referendum.
Continue to build a strong economy with low taxes for people and businesses.
An extra £33.9 billion of NHS funding - and a new Community Hospital in Maldon.
Investment in infrastructure to support new housing development.
Maintain our world-leading record in tackling climate change.
An additional £14 billion for education benefitting all our local schools.
